attributes.name: OIC - Happy Noon Year 2025
attributes.best_description:
Introducing the Happy Noon Year Skate!

Join us for a spectacular family-friendly event that will kick off the New Year with style and joy!

Toast at Noon: As the clock strikes twelve pm, we will raise a glass for a toast to the New Year! Capture the moment with a sparkling beverage in hand, surrounded by the twinkle of ice beneath your feet and the warmth of friends and family.

Don't miss out on the Happy Noon Year Skate – where family, fun, and the promise of a fantastic year ahead come together on the ice! Reserve your spot now for an unforgettable celebration that will leave you skating into the New Year with a heart full of joy.
